name: Dungeon Generator
author: BigJk
description: This randomly generates a dungeon with some basic description. How you use the door and loot descriptions is up to you. The descriptions are based on the "AX1: Old School Adventure Accessories - D30 DM Companion" by Richard J. LeBlanc, Jr.

config.name: Dig Percentage
config.description: Value from 0 to 100 how much of the dungeon should be filled.

config.name: Algorithm Type
config.description: Which algorithm to use for generation.

config.name: Add Doors
config.description: Add description of doors and if they are locked.

config.name: Loot Container Chance
config.description: Percentage (0 - 100%) chance of a loot container present in a room.
